TestCaseMetaData.name: M18_Update_Deactivate
TestCaseMetaData.Description: The Laboratory Test Compendium from Century Hospital Clinical Laboratory is a subset of their Directory of Services. It is based upon the most commonly ordered lab tests by Dr. Radon. This compendium is being used by Dr. Nicholas Radon's practice EHR-S to place orders electronically to Century Hospital's Clinical Laboratory. Century Hospital Laboratory had decided to no longer offer the sedimentation rate test. Century Hospital's LIS transmits the appropriate eDOS update message for approved coverage information for this deactivated test to Dr. Radon's EHR.
TestCaseMetaData.PreCondition: EDOS_1.0_1.1-M08_New and EDOS_1.0_2.1-M10_New and EDOS_1.0_3.1-M04_New and EDOS_1.0_4.1-M18_New_Approved and EDOS_1.0_5.1-M18_New_Limited and EDOS_2.0_1.1-M08_Update_Deactivate and EDOS_2.0_2.1-M10_Update_Deactivate and EDOS_2.0_3.1-M04_Update_Deactivate have been completed.
TestCaseMetaData.PostCondition: eDOS M08, M10, M04 and M18 data elements are incorporated appropriately into the EHR-S.
TestCaseMetaData.TestObjectives: Demonstrate capability to support a M18 approved coverage update message-action: deactivate.
TestCaseMetaData.Comments: Update message about approved coverage information for a deactivated test.
